title: Hook status response
description: A snapshot of the current status of a hook.

lastFire.description:
Information about the last time this hook fired.  This property is only present
if the hook has fired at least once.

oneOf.title: Successful Fire
oneOf.description: Information about a successful firing of the hook

time.description: The time the task was created.  This will not necessarily match `task.created`.

oneOf.title: Failed Fire
oneOf.description: Information about an unsuccessful firing of the hook

error.description:
The error that occurred when firing the task.  This is typically,
but not always, an API error message.

time.description: The time the task was created.  This will not necessarily match `task.created`.

oneOf.title: No Fire
oneOf.description: Information about no firing of the hook (e.g., a new hook)

nextScheduledDate.description:
The next time this hook's task is scheduled to be created. This property
is only present if there is a scheduled next time. Some hooks don't have
any schedules.
